backend/main.mo: Actor defining game types, user profiles, rooms, match state, scoring, and maintaining all backend state maps and constants.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a STOP-sign image update change and associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of multiple frontend source files and their recent feature updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with PWA metadata, icons, fonts, and service worker registration.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying metadata, icons, theme colors, and categories for the app.
frontend/public/sw.js: Minimal service worker implementing install, activation, and network‑first fetch handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React application route configuration using TanStack Router with screens for game flows, leaderboard, store, and admin.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without profiles to register a display name via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/game/LetterRoule: Animated letter roulette component that cycles through the Spanish alphabet and highlights used or selected letters.
frontend/src/components/game/ScoreboardT: Displays a sortable scoreboard table with rankings, handling loading states and highlighting the current user.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with footer, PWA install flow, and a dialog for manual installation instructions.
frontend/src/content/copy.ts: Centralized Spanish UI copy strings for menus, gameplay, dialogs, and store content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-related hooks for checking admin status and performing admin mutations like banning users or words.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile using the actor and exposes authentication state and derived user info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identities, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt events and exposes canInstall plus a promptInstall function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for room, matchmaking, round, and user-related backend actions with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Defines mutations to create Stripe checkout sessions and query session status, with basic config placeholder.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity provider.
frontend/src/screens/admin/AdminScreen.t: Admin panel with metrics, dictionary management, and user tools, including adding or banning words.
frontend/src/screens/GameScreen.tsx: Renders the active game UI, manages rounds, letter roulette, word submission, and navigation.
frontend/src/screens/LobbyScreen.tsx: Displays room lobby, allowing players to join, leave, start the game, and share invite links.
frontend/src/screens/MainMenuScreen.tsx: Main menu with login, room creation/joining, matchmaking, PWA install prompt, and navigation options.
frontend/src/screens/MonthlyLeaderboardS: Displays the monthly leaderboard, handles loading/error states, highlights top players, and allows navigation back to the menu.
frontend/src/screens/RankingScreen.tsx: Shows match rankings based on backend cumulative scores, highlights top user, and provides navigation to leaderboard or menu.
frontend/src/screens/SplashScreen.tsx: Renders the splash screen with logo, title, and a button that navigates to the main menu.
frontend/src/screens/store/PaymentFailur: Shows a payment failure message with options to retry or return to the menu.
frontend/src/screens/store/PaymentSucces: Shows a payment success message, refreshes user data, and provides a button back to the menu.
frontend/src/screens/store/StoreScreen.t: Lists purchasable products and triggers Stripe checkout sessions for selected items.
frontend/src/screens/TribunalScreen.tsx: Displays automatic validation results for submitted words and provides navigation to the ranking screen.
frontend/src/utils/backendScoring.ts: Provides helpers to normalize backend score arrays, retrieve a player’s score, and sort players by descending points.
frontend/src/utils/scorePersistence.ts: Deprecated session‑storage utilities to save, read, and clear per‑room round scores as a non‑authoritative fallback.
frontend/src/utils/scoring.ts: Implements per‑round scoring logic based on word validation and calculates cumulative totals across rounds.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Offers Web Share integration, social-share URL builders, clipboard copying, and invite message helpers.
frontend/src/utils/spanishAlphabet.ts: Exports the canonical Spanish alphabet including Ñ and its associated type.
frontend/src/utils/stopVoice.ts: Plays a 'STOP!' voice line using the Web Speech API with basic error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Project metadata detailing scope, architecture, known issues, required assets, and implemented features.
